data.title: Yearly & Monthly weather
data.meta_description: Yekaterinburg, Russia - Climate and weather forecast by month. Detailed climate information with charts - average monthly weather with temperature, pressure, humidity, precipitation, wind, daylight, sunshine, visibility, and UV index data. The month with the shortest days in Yekaterinburg, Russia, is December, with an average of 6h and 54min of daylight. February and March are months with the least rain in Yekaterinburg, Russia, when the rain falls for 12 days and typically aggregates up to 20mm (0.79") of rain.
data.text:
Average temperature

Yekaterinburg, Russia

The warmest month (with the highest average high temperature) is July (24.4째C).

The month with the lowest average high temperature is January (-9.1째C).

The month with the highest average low temperature is July (14.4째C).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is January (-15.7째C).

Average snowfall days

Yekaterinburg, Russia

The month with the highest number of snowfall days is January (25 days).

The months with the least snowfall days are June, July and August (0 days).

Average daylight / Average sunshine

Yekaterinburg, Russia

The month with the longest days is June (Average daylight: 17h and 42min).

The month with the shortest days is December (Average daylight: 6h and 54min).

The month with the most sunshine is June (Average sunshine: 9h and 6min).

The month with the least sunshine is December (Average sunshine: 1h and 12min).

Average UV index

Yekaterinburg, Russia

The months with the highest UV index are June and July (UV index 6).

The months with the lowest UV index are January, November and December (UV index 0).
